CmdLine: apt update  && apt upgrade -y -o Dpkg::Options::="--force-confold"  && apt install -y         -o APT::Install-Recommends=false         -o APT::Install-Suggests=false         sudo         python3         python3-pip  && pip3 install setuptools  && pip3 install ansible  && ln -s /usr/bin/python3 /usr/bin/python  && apt autoremove -y  && apt clean  && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*            /var/tmp/*            /usr/share/doc            /usr/share/man  && rm -rf /root/.cache/pip/  && find / -name '*.pyc' -delete  && find / -name '*__pycache__*' -delete
Commands.Name: run
